32nd Annual Food Drive
Oct 1 - Nov 8
CMU’s 32nd Annual Food Drive Oct. 1-Nov. 7, 2025 benefitting the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
Each year, the CMU community comes together to address hunger and food insecurity in our region through the highest-grossing food drive in the City of Pittsburgh. Help us keep the tradition alive in 2025!

Benefits Open Enrollment
Oct 27 - Nov 17
Open Enrollment is your chance to review and update your benefits for the upcoming year. Your new benefits will take effect on Jan. 1, 2026, and will remain in place for the entire year.  Log in to Workday Oct. 27 through Nov. 17 at 5 p.m. to review and/or make changes to your benefits.
